mapper.select: select s.id as showId,sc.show_type,u.id as userId,r.review_creation_date ,r.id AS reviewId, r.rating, s.title, s.content,s.img_route, r.content as reviewContent, u.user_name from review_tb as r join show_tb as s on r.show_id = s.id join user_tb as u on r.user_id = u.id join category_tb as sc on s.show_type_id = sc.id order by r.id desc limit #{begin}, #{range};
